about_the_game:
Journey to the highest peak of the Harz Mountains passing breathtaking scenery with the historic narrow-gauge Brockenbahn Railway from WaggonWerkstatt.

The Brockenbahn is one of the most picturesque railways in Germany and has a rich history dating back to the late 19th century. Recreated here in Train Simulator you will drive from Wernigerode and ascend to an altitude of 1,125 metres as you climb to your destination at the Brocken summit. As you travel up the mountain you will enjoy dense forests, deep valleys, fascinating rock formations, charming villages, and stunning panoramic views of the Harz region. It’s not hard to see why this route is on the bucket list for many railfans.

Your engine for this historic journey is the BR 99.23 metre-gauge tank locomotive. Built by LKM Babelsberg in 1954-56. One of the most powerful narrow-gauge steam locomotives built for German routes, these were perfect for the challenging task of taking on the Harz Mountains. Along with this iconic machine the route includes appropriate passenger and packing cars as used on the real-life railway. All ready to use with Career, Standard and Quick Drive scenarios.

Discover the wonders of the Brockenbahn in Train Simulator.

Included Scenarios


A selection of engaging Career, Standard and Quick Drive scenarios are included:

  • Full steam to the Brocken - Part 1
  • Full steam to the Brocken - Part 2
  • Full steam to the Brocken - Part 3
  • Winter wonderland
  • Up in autumn
  • On test run
  • Schnelles-Spiel-Szenario
  • Quick Drive - Brocken
  • Quick Drive - Wernigerode

    More scenarios are available on the Steam Workshop online and in-game. Train Simulator’s Steam Workshop scenarios are free and easy to download, adding many more hours of exciting gameplay. With scenarios being added daily, why don’t you check it out now!

    Key Features


    • 32-km recreation of the historic Brockenbahn narrow-gauge railroad
    • Realistic track construction with elevation to 1125m altitude
    • 11 detailed stations
    • Authentic landscapes and scenery
    • Water cranes, coal bunkers and diesel filling station
    • KS signal system
    • Detailed BR 99.23 steam locomotive with realistic controls
    • Rolling stock includes packing car and two passenger cars
    • 6 Career scenarios, 1 Standard scenario, and 2 Quick Drive scenarios
    • Quick Drive compatible
    • Download size: 632 MB

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 4330 3.50 GHz Dual Core or AMD A8 6600K 3.90 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 Graphics with 1 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator Classic User Guide.
